definition: to reserve a room
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
surname Fang
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: I hereby authorized the use of oneself credit card to guarantee the reservation with Cinese Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 以上所有订房是否预定将由本人以信用卡担保。

sentences.english: He and Xiao Yang are having a final check about the reservation.
sentences.chinese: 他在和肖杨最后一次核实旅馆订房的问题。

sentences.english: It's my pleasure, sir, Do you have the hotel voucher with you?
sentences.chinese: 这是我的荣幸，先生。请问您带订房凭单了吗？

sentences.english: Book room individually, no organizer, clear account directly by him/herself when check-out.
sentences.chinese: 个人订房，没有组织者，退房时直接与酒店结算。

sentences.english: All in-coming leads will be reviewed on a monthly basis.
sentences.chinese: 所有的订房线索将每月回顾一次。

sentences.english: How do you deal with a reservation mix-up？
sentences.chinese: 你们如何处理订房出现的差错？

sentences.english: The room-booking information travels to the housekeeping department and the hotel's accountants.
sentences.chinese: 然后订房信息被发送给客房部和酒店的会计部。

sentences.english: You have configured the room-booking workflow, except it has no forms and no database.
sentences.chinese: 您已经配置了订房工作流，除了它没有表格和数据库。

sentences.english: To make room reservation, please use the attached Application Form to qualify for special room rate.
sentences.chinese: 请用附件报名表订房才可享受特别房价优惠。

sentences.english: Bookings at pay-by-the-hour "love motels" have also risen sharply.
sentences.chinese: 以小时计费的“情侣汽车旅馆”订房率也大幅上升。

sentences.english: No reservation will be accepted without credit card details.
sentences.chinese: 信用卡资料未填写完整，无法完成订房。

definition: to place an order/to book ahead
to book tickets/to issue tickets
room charge
to reserve a seat/to book a table/reservation
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
to rent a place with sb else to share the costs
hotel room with one double (or queen or king) bed
to stay at/lodging/accommodation
to check out of a hotel room
to reserve tickets
abbr. for 標準間|标准间[biao1 zhun3 jian1], standard (hotel) room
youth hostel/abbr. for 青年旅舍[qing1 nian2 lu:3 she4]
youth hostel
inn/small hotel/hostel
double room
air ticket/passenger ticket/CL:張|张[zhang1]
